name: Crazywarz
description:
Controls:

Move with: {"W", "A", "S", "D"}

Jump by clicking: "Space Bar"

Use spells: {"1", "2", "3", "4"}

Auto attack: "Right Mouse Button"

*** IMPORTANT: ***

---
1) Use the tools on the upper left corner to draw your character (and spell icons as well).

2)Select the spells on the bottom left and edit them (there are 4 spells in total in the list, 3 of which are marked with star symbols and last one with a latter "U")

*DO NOT CLICK "SAVE" AFTER EDITING JUST ONE SPELL OR THE GAME WILL START + DO NOT CLICK ON THE "CLEAR" BUTTON OR IT WILL REMOVE ALL THE EFFECTS YOU ADDED TO THE SPELL => after editing just leave it as is and move on to the next spell

3) After you are satisfied with your character click "Save" button and the game will start

---

If you are having trouble editing the spells feel free to leave a comment! : D

Enjoy! : )
